channel.title: Thomas Mulcair
channel.description: Recent news about Thomas Mulcair, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Coquitlam Now
item.description:
NDP calls for Senate abolition
NDP leader Thomas Mulcair is joined at a stop in Port Moody by Burnaby-Douglas MP Kennedy Stewart, left, and New Westminster-Coquitlam MP Fin Donnelly, right. Photograph by: Lisa King. Ndp Mulcair rocky point. NDP leader Thomas Mulcair is joined at ...

item.title: Mentioned by City News
item.description:
Roll up red carpet for senators, Thomas Mulcair says - The Tri
At a press conference yesterday at Rocky Point Park in Port Moody, NDP leader Thomas Mulcair and New Westminster-Coquitlam-Port Moody MP Fin Donnelly launched an attack against the Senate. Mulcair stated it's undemocratic to appoint senators to ...

item.title: Mentioned by Brantford Expositor
item.description:
Senate debate heats up with Mulcair visit to Brantford
The debate about Canada's scandal-ridden Senate heated up in Brantford on Tuesday with Opposition Leader Thomas Mulcair calling it a relic from the British past and Conservative Brant MP Phil McColeman expressing his distaste for the controversy ...

item.title: Mentioned by MetroNews Canada
item.description:
NDP's Thomas Mulcair in town today, Justin Trudeau to attend Liberal rally on ...
Federal NDP leader Thomas Mulcair is in town on Monday as part of a campaign he launched in Ottawa on Monday morning to abolish the senate. Mulcair is scheduled to make an announcement with Dartmouth-Cole Harbour MP Robert Chisholm at 4 p.m. ...

item.description:
